locations.title: Locations
locations.shortDescription: Enter details about each location used here. Any location that serves as either a depot or a trip starting or end point must be included.

headerTooltip.Depot: Whether this location serves as a start and end location for vehicles.
headerTooltip.Demand: The vehicle capacity required to serve this location. The default value is 1, meaning a single vehicle will expend 1 unit of capacity to visit this location. This field is only relevant when vehicles have limited capacity.
headerTooltip.Stop Duration: How long the assigned vehicle needs to stay at this location before proceeding to the next location. Leave empty or set to 0 if not needed. If using clock-based time, this field should be given in minutes. If using integer-based time, this field should be in integer units.
headerTooltip.min_start_int: An integer value indicating the earliest time a vehicle can arrive at this location. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum arrival time.
headerTooltip.max_start_int: An integer value indicating the latest time a vehicle can arrive at this location. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum arrival time.
headerTooltip.exact_start_int: An integer value indicating the exact time a vehicle must arrive at this location. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no exact arrival time.
headerTooltip.Arrival Day: A integer value indicating the day this location must be visited. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no exact arrival day.
headerTooltip.Arrival Date: A date value, of the form mm-dd-yyyy, indicating the date this location must be visited. Leave this field empty if there is no arrival date requirement.
headerTooltip.max_start_time: A time value, of the form hh-mm am|pm, indicating the latest time this location can be visited. Leave this field empty if these is no maximum arrival time.
headerTooltip.min_start_time: A time value, of the form hh-mm am|pm, indicating the earliest time this location can be visited. Leave this field empty if these is no minimum arrival time.
headerTooltip.exact_start_time: A time value, of the form hh-mm am|pm, indicating the exact time this location can be visited. Leave this field empty if these is no exact arrival time requirement.
headerTooltip.Vehicle Types: Select the vehicle types that are able to visit this location. Leave empty if there are no specific vehicle requirements for this location.
Select the vehicle types that are able to visit this location. Leave empty if there are no specific vehicle requirements for this location.
headerTooltip.Color: The color to plot this location on the map. This will not impact optimization.
headerTooltip.min_start_day: An integer value indicating the earliest day a vehicle can arrive at this location. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum arrival day. This field must be entered if an Earliest Arrival time is entered.
headerTooltip.max_start_day: An integer value indicating the latest day a vehicle can arrive at this location. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum arrival day. This field must be entered if an Latest Arrival time is entered.
headerTooltip.exact_start_day: An integer value indicating the exact day a vehicle must arrive at this location. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no exact arrival day. This field must be entered if an Exact Arrival time is entered.

timeWindows.description: Locations have time windows for arrivals

pickupStart.description: Arrival at location must occur after a specified time

pickupEnd.description: Arrival at location must occur before a specified time

pickupExact.description: Arrival at location must occur at an exact time

trips.title: Trips
trips.shortDescription: Enter details about each trip here.

headerTooltip.Demand: The vehicle capacity required to complete this trip. The default value is 1, meaning a single vehicle will expend 1 unit of capacity to complete this trip. This field is only relevant when vehicles have limited capacity.

The vehicle capacity required to complete this trip. The default value is 1, meaning a single vehicle will expend 1 unit of capacity to complete this trip. This field is only relevant when vehicles have limited capacity.
headerTooltip.Vehicle Types: Select the vehicle types that are able to complete this trip. Leave empty if there are no specific vehicle requirements for this trip.
headerTooltip.Trip ID: An auto-generated field with a unique identifier for each trip.
headerTooltip.min_start_day: An integer value indicating the earliest day a vehicle can arrive at this location. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum arrival day. This field must be entered if an Earliest Arrival time is entered.
headerTooltip.min_start_date: A date value, of the form mm/dd/yyyy, indicating the earliest date a vehicle can arrive at this location. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum arrival date. This field must be entered if an Earliest Arrival time is entered.
headerTooltip.min_start_int: An integer value indicating the earliest time a vehicle can begin this trip. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum arrival time.
headerTooltip.min_start_time: A time value, of the form hh:mm am|pm, indicating the earliest time a vehicle can begin this trip. Leave this field empty if these is no minimum arrival time.
headerTooltip.max_start_day: An integer value indicating the latest day a vehicle can arrive at this location. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum arrival day. This field must be entered if a Latest Arrival time is entered.
headerTooltip.max_start_date: A date value, of the form mm/dd/yyyy, indicating the latest date a vehicle can arrive at this location. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum arrival date. This field must be entered if a Latest Arrival time is entered.
headerTooltip.max_start_int: An integer value indicating the latest time a vehicle can begin this trip. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum arrival time.
headerTooltip.max_start_time: A time value, of the form hh:mm am|pm, indicating the latest time a vehicle can begin this trip. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum arrival time.
headerTooltip.min_end_day: An integer value indicating the earliest day a vehicle can deliver this trip. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum dropoff day. This field must be entered if an Earliest Dropoff time is entered.
headerTooltip.min_end_date: A date value, of the form mm/dd/yyyy, indicating the earliest date a vehicle can deliver this trip. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum dropoff date. This field must be entered if an Earliest Dropoff time is entered.
headerTooltip.min_end_int: An integer value indicating the earliest time a vehicle can deliver this trip. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no minimum dropoff time.
headerTooltip.min_end_time: A time value, of the form hh:mm am|pm, indicating the earliest time a vehicle can deliver this trip. Leave this field empty if these is no minimum dropoff time.
headerTooltip.max_end_day: An integer value indicating the latest day a vehicle can deliver this trip. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum dropoff day. This field must be entered if a Latest Dropoff time is entered.
headerTooltip.max_end_date: A date value, of the form mm/dd/yyyy, indicating the latest date a vehicle can deliver this trip. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum dropoff date. This field must be entered if a Latest Dropoff time is entered.
headerTooltip.max_end_int: An integer value indicating the latest time a vehicle can end this trip. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum dropoff time.
headerTooltip.max_end_time: A time value, of the form hh:mm am|pm, indicating the latest time a vehicle can end this trip. Leave this field empty if there is no maximum dropoff time.
headerTooltip.exact_start_day: A integer value indicating the day this trip must be completed. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no exact arrival day.
headerTooltip.exact_start_date: A date value, of the form mm-dd-yyyy, indicating the date this trip must be completed. Leave this field empty if there is no arrival date requirement.
headerTooltip.exact_start_int: An integer value indicating the exact time this trip must start at. Leave this field empty if there is no exact pickup time.
headerTooltip.exact_start_time: A time value, of the form hh:mm am|pm, indicating the exact time this trip must be started. Leave this field empty if there is no exact pickup time.
headerTooltip.exact_end_day: An integer value indicating the day this trip must be completed. The minimum value is 0. Leave this field empty if there is no exact dropoff day. This field must be entered if an Exact Dropoff time is entered.
headerTooltip.exact_end_date: A date value, of the form mm/dd/yyyy, indicating the date this trip must be completed. Leave this field empty if there is no dropoff date requirement. This field must be entered if an Exact Dropoff time is entered.
headerTooltip.exact_end_int: An integer value indicating the exact time this trip must finish at. Leave this field empty if there is no exact dropoff time.
headerTooltip.exact_end_time: A time value, of the form hh:mm am|pm, indicating the exact time this trip must be completed. Leave this field empty if there is no exact dropoff time.

timeWindows.description: Trips have time windows for pickups and/or dropoffs

pickupStart.description: Pickup must occur after a specified time

pickupEnd.description: Pickup must occur before a specified time

pickupExact.description: Pickup must occur at an exact time

dropoffStart.description: Dropoff must occur after a specified time

dropoffEnd.description: Dropoff must occur before a specified time

dropoffExact.description: Dropoff must occur at an exact time

vehicles.title: Vehicles
vehicles.shortDescription: Enter the vehicles that will be used here

headerTooltip.Depot: The location this vehicle begins and ends its route at.
headerTooltip.Arrival Time: A time value, of the form hh-mm am|pm, indicating the exact time this location can be visited. Leave this field empty if these is no exact arrival time requirement.
headerTooltip.Vehicle Type: Select the type of vehicle. Vehicle types should be populated from the Vehicle Type table.
headerTooltip.Fixed Cost: The fixed cost for using each vehicle to service at least one location. Higher values make it less likely the vehicle will be used.
The fixed cost for using each vehicle to service at least one location. Higher values make it less likely the vehicle will be used.
headerTooltip.Color: The color to use when plotting this vehicle's route on the map
headerTooltip.Vehicle ID: An auto-generated field with a unique identifier for each vehicle.
headerTooltip.Starting Location: The starting location for this vehicle.
headerTooltip.min_start_day: The earliest day this vehicle can start its route.
headerTooltip.min_start_date: The earliest date this vehicle can start its route.
headerTooltip.min_start_int: The earliest time this vehicle can start its route, in integer time units (i.e. 100 indicates the vehicle cannot start its route until 100 minutes after the start of optimization at t=0).
headerTooltip.min_start_time: The earliest time this vehicle can start its route, as a time value of the form hh-mm am|pm.
headerTooltip.max_end_date: The latest date this vehicle can start its route.
headerTooltip.max_end_day: The latest day this vehicle can start its route.
headerTooltip.max_end_int: The latest time this vehicle can end its route, in integer time units (i.e. 100 indicates the vehicle must end its route no later than 200 minutes after the start of optimization at t=0).
headerTooltip.max_end_time: The latest time this vehicle can start its route, as a time value of the form hh-mm am|pm.

pickupStart.description: Vehicle cannot start its route before a specified time

pickupEnd.description: Vehicle cannot end its route after a specified time

headerTooltip.Vehicle Type: A unique name for the vehicle type.
headerTooltip.Allow Resupplies?: Whether this vehicle type can return to the depot to re-supply. This field is only relevant for capacitated problems.
Whether this vehicle type can return to the depot to re-supply. This field is only relevant for capacitated problems.
headerTooltip.Capacity: The capacity for vehicles of this type. This field is only relevant for capacitated problems. Leave field empty to indicate unlimited capacity.
The capacity for vehicles of this type. This field is only relevant for capacitated problems. Leave field empty to indicate unlimited capacity.
headerTooltip.Icon: An optional field for identifying this vehicle in displays. This field does not impact the optimization calculations.

travel_costs.title: Travel Costs
travel_costs.shortDescription: Enter the costs from each location in row to each location in column.

headerTooltip.Travel Distance: The travel distance from the From Location to the To Location. This field is used when the objective is to minimize travel distance.
headerTooltip.Travel Duration: The travel time it takes to travel from the From Location to the To Location. This field is used when the objective is to minimize travel duration and/or when there are time constraints on the problem (i.e. vehicle start and end times).
headerTooltip.Travel Cost (custom): A user-defined cost between From Location to the To Location. This field is used when the objective is to minimize a custom cost function.

route_results_vrp.title: Routes
route_results_vrp.shortDescription: The optimal routes generated by the optimizer

resultsArrival.description: Vehicle arrives at location at this time

resultsDeparture.description: Vehcle departs location at this time

route_results_tsp.title: Routes
route_results_tsp.shortDescription: The optimal routes generated by the optimizer

locationsXY.title: Locations
locationsXY.shortDescription: Enter details about each location used here. Any location that serves as either a depot or a trip starting or end point must be included.
